[00:00.00]STARGAZING (Explicit) - Travis Scott
[00:09.13]Lyrics by：Jacques Webster/Sonny Uwaezuoke/Brandon Korn/Brandon Whitfield/Samuel Gloade/Cydel Young/Jamie Lepe/Mike Dean
[00:18.26]Composed by：Jacques Webster/Sonny Uwaezuoke/Brandon Korn/Brandon Whitfield/Samuel Gloade/Cydel Young/Jamie Lepe/Mike Dean
[00:27.39]Rollin' rollin' rollin' got me stargazin'
[00:30.23]Yeah
[00:30.92]Sippin' on purp feelin' like the Barre Baby
[00:33.60]It's lit
[00:34.04]Whatever I downed it got me goin' crazy
[00:36.30]Yah
[00:37.26]Psychedelics got me goin' crazy
[00:39.91]Alright
[00:40.34]I was hot as hell out in the heat
[00:43.01]Yeah yeah
[00:43.56]Then a storm came in and saved my life
[00:46.42]Head up to the sky down on my knees
[00:48.82]Straight up
[00:49.42]Out of nowhere you came here to save the night
[00:52.48]In the nighttime
[00:55.86]Woo yeah
[01:05.78]Rollin' rollin' rollin' got me stargazin'
[01:08.66]Roll
[01:09.48]Psychedelics got me goin' crazy
[01:11.45]Oh no
[01:12.00]N***s femalin' they excellin'
[01:14.79]Yeah
[01:15.37]Are they intellin'
[01:16.31]What you tellin'
[01:17.27]We propellin' up top with Ellen uh
[01:20.46]With the choppers
[01:21.79]Kill the jealous with propane repellent
[01:23.07]Got me goin' crazy
[01:24.49]It's lit
[01:24.91]On tour we'll tell 'em we brought the section
[01:27.97]Gang
[01:28.15]They keep on callin' up it's getting hectic
[01:31.05]Brrt
[01:31.52]Like we projected
[01:33.10]So we cut the plug he's interjected
[01:35.69]Got me goin' crazy
[01:37.68]Rollin' rollin' rollin' got me stargazin'
[01:40.70]Yeah
[01:41.38]Sippin' on purp feelin' like the Barre Baby
[01:43.78]It's lit
[01:44.45]Whatever I downed it got me goin' crazy
[01:46.82]Yah
[01:47.71]Psychedelics got me goin' crazy
[01:50.36]Alright
[01:50.58]I was hot as hell out in the heat
[01:53.40]Yeah yeah
[01:53.71]Then the storm came in and saved my life
[01:57.11]Head up to the sky down on my knees
[01:59.06]Straight up
[01:59.67]Out of nowhere you came here to save the night
[02:02.89]In the nighttime
[02:06.30]Woo yeah
[02:26.79]Got me goin' crazy
[03:09.32]Okay I been up for some days I ain't got time to lay
[03:12.15]Just to drown out all these thoughts I tried all kind of things
[03:15.03]If I take you to my past you will be traumatized
[03:18.05]Got a thousand kids outside that's tryna come alive
[03:20.48]'99 took AstroWorld it had to relocate
[03:23.65]Told the dawgs I'd bring it back it was a seal of faith
[03:26.61]Before no car notes baby girl she played the tourist guide
[03:29.41]Got the keys into my city now she know the rides
[03:32.43]Got new money got new problems got new enemies
[03:35.35]When you make it to the top that's the amenities
[03:38.62]Packin' out Toyota like I'm in the league
[03:41.39]And it ain't a mosh pit if ain't no injuries
[03:43.88]I got 'em stage divin' out the nosebleeds
[03:46.46]Alright alright alright
[03:47.50]And she hit that booger sugar 'til her nose bleed
[03:49.37]Alright alright alright
[03:50.46]Bounce that s**t forever she on both knees
[03:52.74]She was talkin' 'bout forever got a whole week
[03:55.15]Alright alright alright
[03:55.96]Plus she know my baby mama is a trophy
[03:58.51]She be throwin' up them B's feel like we both bleed
[04:01.31]She keep my dick jumpin' up feel like I'm Moby
[04:04.07]I'm way too gold for this beef feel like I'm Kobe yeah
[04:07.81]This right here is astronomical
[04:09.99]I see you picked up all my ways I feel responsible
[04:12.85]They tryna say that all my problems is improbable
[04:15.88]They keep itchin' at my spirit I'm diabolical
[04:18.30]Ya feel me
data.trans:
[ti:STARGAZING (Explicit)]
[ar:Travis Scott]
[al:ASTROWORLD (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:09.13]//
[00:18.26]//
[00:27.39]好兴奋 我开始眺望星空
[00:30.23]//
[00:30.92]饮用那种饮料 感觉就像Barre Baby
[00:33.60]真不错
[00:34.04]不管我喝了什么 反正让我很疯狂
[00:36.30]//
[00:37.26]那种东西让我快要疯掉啦
[00:39.91]好的
[00:40.34]我曾经在街头过着不要命的生活
[00:43.01]//
[00:43.56]后来一场风暴降临 拯救了我的生命
[00:46.42]抬头望着天 跪在大地上
[00:48.82]真的
[00:49.42]你突然冒出来 拯救了这一夜
[00:52.48]在黑夜时分
[00:55.86]//
[01:05.78]好兴奋 我开始眺望星空
[01:08.66]兴奋
[01:09.48]那种东西让我快要疯掉啦
[01:11.45]//
[01:12.00]这个行业的女人 越来越成功
[01:14.79]//
[01:15.37]她们是不是很聪明
[01:16.31]你说什么
[01:17.27]我们不断前行 和Ellen一起直冲云霄
[01:20.46]就像直升机
[01:21.79]用那种东西来消灭心中的妒忌
[01:23.07]让我快要疯掉了
[01:24.49]真不错
[01:24.91]巡演中 我们会告诉他们 我们带来了无与伦比的音乐
[01:27.97]帮派
[01:28.15]他们一直在呼喊 场面越来越热闹
[01:31.05]//
[01:31.52]就像我们预期的那样
[01:33.10]所以我们不再需要中间商 他的生意被抢了
[01:35.69]让我快要疯掉了
[01:37.68]好兴奋 我开始眺望星空
[01:40.70]//
[01:41.38]饮用那种饮料 感觉就像Barre Baby
[01:43.78]真不错
[01:44.45]不管我喝了什么 反正让我很疯狂
[01:46.82]//
[01:47.71]那种东西让我快要疯掉啦
[01:50.36]好的
[01:50.58]我曾经在街头过着不要命的生活
[01:53.40]//
[01:53.71]后来一场风暴降临 拯救了我的生命
[01:57.11]抬头望着天 跪在大地上
[01:59.06]真的
[01:59.67]你突然冒出来 拯救了这一夜
[02:02.89]在黑夜时分
[02:06.30]//
[02:26.79]让我快要疯掉了
[03:09.32]我好几天没睡了 我没时间睡觉
[03:12.15]为了赶走这些奇怪的思绪 我试了各种办法
[03:15.03]如果我带你去我的过去 你会感到很痛苦
[03:18.05]外面仿佛有一千个死去的孩子想要重获新生
[03:20.48]那时候 AstroWorld经营不善 需要重新选址 
[03:23.65]我告诉兄弟们 我会让它重生 一定不会食言
[03:26.61]之前 没人注意到 宝贝姑娘 她扮演着导游
[03:29.41]得到了通往我的城市的钥匙 现在她知道怎么玩了
[03:32.43]有了新钞票 有了新问题 有了新敌人
[03:35.35]当你登上顶峰时 这都是不可避免的
[03:38.62]挤在丰田中心体育馆 就好像我也是球队的一员
[03:41.39]如果没有人受伤 那就不算在狂舞
[03:43.88]我让观众从座位上直接跳下来
[03:46.46]好的
[03:47.50]她不停吸那种东西 直到流鼻血
[03:49.37]好的
[03:50.46]一直在狂欢 她双膝跪地
[03:52.74]她说想要和我永远在一起 我只有一个星期
[03:55.15]好的
[03:55.96]而且 她知道我的女友是个尤物
[03:58.51]她有钱得很 感觉我们两个都是血帮人
[04:01.31]她让我总是兴奋不已 感觉我是Moby
[04:04.07]我太优秀了 不屑于跟他们扯 感觉我是科比
[04:07.81]这东西就像天文学
[04:09.99]我看你学习我的一举一动 我感觉自己有责任
[04:12.85]他们说我的问题都是很荒谬的
[04:15.88]他们总是对我心怀不满 我就是讨人厌
[04:18.30]你懂我意思吗
